text: 2.13: 1 Ko 1.7; Fi 3.20; Kor 3.4; Hi 9.28; 1 Zo 3.2Nza ana tɨvi zɨn ŋgɨp, nza khaŋ tɨgɨp havhargip mba bigɨna vhuuŋ ganɨ saŋv, nen ndikndigip nen rargɨp kɨrga. Nza Zisas Krais rargap ki, ana ŋkasŋkagi Fhe Bakɨme ma. Ana taagia nza ndi guma ma. Ana Fhe Bakɨmen sɨɨn vhuuŋ gum, ana vhava ŋaara bakɨme, ana ŋkasŋka bakɨme phorgɨp kɨrar hɨrga.
